input.sentences: two guys decided to do some yardwork .
they took a break and two new guys started working .
the wife decided shed do it herself .
output.sentences: The boy scouts volunteered to do park maintenance.
The had to load piles mulch into barrels and haul it away.
It was much harder work than they had expected.
The piles seemed to tower over their heads no matter how long they worked.
It felt wonderful to bury the shovel in the dirt at last and leave for the day.
